void adc_start (_Bool left)
 Sets up the registers and starts the Analog to Digital converter.
void adc_stop (void)
 Stops the Analog to Digital conversions.
void adc_change (char chan)
 Change the ADC to use the given pin. 8 will return the results for the internal temperature sensor.

Function Documentation

void adc_change ( char  chan  ) 

Change the ADC to use the given pin. 8 will return the results for the internal temperature sensor.

Parameters:
chan char - 0 through 8, representing which ADC pin the results are returned from
Returns:
void - Returns nothing
void adc_start ( _Bool  left  ) 

Sets up the registers and starts the Analog to Digital converter.

Parameters:
left _Bool - Left adjust results (1) for 8bit results, or no left adjust (0) for full 10bit results. If using 8bit, simply read ADCH for the value, if using 10bit, read ADCL then ADCH.
Returns:
void - Returns nothing
void adc_stop ( void   ) 

Stops the Analog to Digital conversions.

Returns:
void - Returns nothing
